Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
"The universe is dark and filled with abominations, but the cleansing fire burns them all away." - High Exterminator Bettrack
Bettrack - Male name (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize)
"We commence the great purge. The fire will be used to fight the corruption from without, and within, the Union." - High Exterminator Bettrack
Bettrack - Male name (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize) "Union" refers to the Star Union
"We can take the heat. We walk through fire together. Only those that pass through fire understand its proper application." - Nox Magginski, Fireman
Nox Magginski - Male name (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize)
"Ao Oblívio vamos. E das trevas eles vêm." - Cultista
Cultist could be male or female. Not an in-game unit. "Oblivion" refers to Psynumbra concepts of their powers.
"A dor é inevitável, o sofrimento é opcional. O grande portão precisa ser aberto." - Iniciado Voluntário
"One by one, my brothers have failed and perished in front of me. But I will survive and transcend into the Harmony of Oblivion" - Host of Malictor
Malictor - Psynumbra unit (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize) "Harmony of Oblivion" refers to Psynumbra concepts of their powers.
"Competition creates change. Evolution dictates that weaker players be replaced. We intend to be on the winning team. " -Dr. Drake Becker, Xenotech Labs
Drake Becker - male name (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize) Xenotech Labs are in-game locations.
"Can't these zealots see that the gods have given us the ability to create, so that we can continue their work?" - Dr. Eva Montinga, Chief Bio Scientist
Eva Montinga - Female name (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize)
"We've cultured a virus that harvests the best attributes of every lifeform into a single homozygotic lifeform. We're that good." - CEO Tranton Orr, Xenotech Labs
CEO Tranton Orr - Male name (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize)
"Através da Síntese, todos serão conectados, e todos serão um. Verdadeira igualdade através da unidade." - Anônimo
Synthesis is an in-game technology. Speaker could be male or female.
"Não se deixe cegar, a verdade é que somos prisioneiros. Livre-se das algemas da sociedade e lute por sua redenção." - Anônimo
Speaker could be male or female.
"Ao abrir sua mente para abraçar a realidade da Síntese, sua percepção do mundo se expande e você poderá ver a verdade da existência." - Anônimo
Speaker could be male or female.
"A Luz arde dentro de todos nós. É um grande pecado apagá-la."
"Light" refers to an in-game Celestian concept.
"Lembre-se da Ordem e de seus ensinamentos. Lembre-se dos caídos e de seus sonhos. Lembre-se dos muitos que seriam esquecidos. Lembre-se de se importar."

"Durante o dia, o sol enche o mundo com uma grande luz. À noite, o céu é pontilhado por muitas pequenas luzes. No entanto, passamos tanto tempo olhando para cima, que esquecemos de olhar para dentro."
"Adentre o futuro, o passado e o presente de uma só vez. Supere as limitações do espaço-tempo." - Slogan Voidtech, Promo de Financiamento Nível 8
Speaker could be male or female.
"VoidTech strums reality's strings, resonating across infinite emptiness. Those harmonics create a symphony of possibilities." - Dr. Terrance Lantin, Voidtech
Terrance Lantin - Male name (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize)
"Dimensional science is the pinnacle of scientific progress, all other fields are insignificant to what we aim to achieve." - Dr. Johan Sköglar
Johan Sköglar - Male name (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize)
"With the Morpheus Dreaming Device, everyone can enter the shared marvelous dreamland during their cryogenic sleep. Remembering dreams is not guaranteed." - Morpheus Corp Disclaimer
Morpheus Corp - Company name (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize)
"Fui despertado de um sono profundo de cem anos. Mesmo assim, ainda preciso dormir todos os dias." - Cliente Insatisfeito
Speaker could be male or female.
"Será que quem hiberna sonha com ovelhas congeladas?" - Pergunta frequente de cliente
Speaker could be male or female.
"Go places. There are no traffic jams in space. " - Trent MacLan, Astronaut
Trent MacLan - Male name (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize)
"Reserve um tour espacial, diziam. Veja novos lugares, diziam. Eu só dei de ombros e reiniciei meus óculos de RV." - Espaçonauta Anônimo
Speaker could be male or female.
"Turn off your VR-Suite and go places. Get out into the universe. You get no extra lives, so experience it in person. No virtual thrill compares to fleeing for one's life." - Mah Reg'Nib, Traveler
Mah Reg'Nib - Kir'Ko (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize)
"Nada de emoções falsas em RV, viva a experiência real. Todos os desejos podem ser realizados… pelo preço certo." - Guia de Viagens da Star Union
Speaker could be male or female.
"O que acontece nos Parques Elísios, fica nos Parques Elísios. Isso é garantido pelo nosso Status de Isenção de Vigilância." - Folheto dos Parques Elísios
Elysium Parks is an in-game location. Surveillance Exemption Status refers to in-game flavour text.
"Parece exatamente como você imaginaria o céu à noite." - Cliente Satisfeito
Speaker could be male or female.
"The numb Paragon visitors seek to rekindle their humanity with debauched sensations. These resorts are the embodiment of our decline." - Ryam Cato, Moralist
Ryam Cato - male (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize)
"The Planetary Governors are a façade, to give the plebs a face to look up to. Instead the Star Union is administered by the cold omnipresent machines of CORE." - Outlander Admiral Lumey
Outlander Admiral Lumey - male (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize)
"Como Governador Planetário, juro solenemente defender as leis da Star Union neste mundo, proteger a União, indivisível, com liberdade e justiça para todos." - Juramento de Posse do Governador
"Planetary Governor" is an in-game universe title. Could be male or female.
"When the consequences do not impact the Star Union as a whole, CORE expects people to assume the responsibility of settling matters on their own." - Gallina Constance, Peacekeeper
Gallina Constance - Female name (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize)
"Terratech Uniseed performs under all circumstances, delivering a consistent and nutrient independent taste." - Terratech Agriculture Brochure
"Terratech Uniseed" refers to in-game lore. (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize)
"Eat, drink, and be merry, for tomorrow we're recycled fertilizer." - Hamilton Biggs, Biodome Farmer
Hammilton Biggs - male name "Biodome" refers to in-game building (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize)
"Biodomes compensate for environmental imbalances. They are the reason when the cataclysm hit, some of the population survived." - Ormo Tusk, Agricultural Scientist
Ormo Tusk - Male name (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize)
"Milhões de mentes buscando os segredos do universo em harmonia, sonhando com um mundo onde tudo é possível." - Laboratórios de Pesquisa Unificados CORE
"CORE Unified Research Laboraties" refers to an in-game concept.
"Union mindpods direct even the most undisciplined engineering and scientific minds to produce useful technological research." - Ui'Geen Tika, Lab Director
Ui'Geen Tika - male. (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize)
"The Research Lab contains an assortment of learning devices that we neglected in our haste to survive the cataclysm. It will aide in keeping a fine technological edge." - Myre Vinn, Technologist
Myre Vinn - female (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize)
"Cave Mais Fundo. Encontre Mais. Produza Mais. Viva Mais." - Lema da Mineração Dvar
Speaker could be male or female.
"Nothing commits a people to the mission of acquiring profit more than digging a giant hole in the earth." - Sontransk Lam, Prospector
Sontransk Lam - female(Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize)
"This is a beautiful land, perfect for a deep resource-extracting mining complex." - Gorgle Grok, Foreman
Gorgle Grok - male (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize)
"Use Sistemas de Reator Paragon. Potencialize seus sistemas com a fonte de energia mais limpa e forte disponível. Faça cada elétron valer." - Conselho Publicitário de Energia PRS
"Paragon Reactor Systems" refers to in-game flavout text. "PRS" is abbreveation of above.
"The Star Union left reactors in some of the most unlikely places, knowing their infrastructure would eventually require it. " - Cmdr. Penweather Tufol, Planetary Exploration
Penweather Tufol - male (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize)
"Imagine the atomic universe colliding, exploding, and combining and all that energy is contained in a bottle called a reactor." - Dr. Urtissa Thany, High Energy Physicist
Urtissa Thany - female (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize)
"Be it a sunken city made by men or a natural coral reef, the sea accepts them all and the creatures of the deep find lodging therein." - Dolat Dolor, Harbormaster
Dolat Dolor - male (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize)
"There is something in the water. Something that snags my fishing nets and breaks my anchorlines. " - Leenad Falk, Fisherman
Leenad Falk - male (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize)
"The frigid waters of the deep dark sea preserve a legacy of our mistakes upon this world. " - Emporer Salek Pantine
Salek Pantine - Male name (Transcribe - to non latin fonts - but do not localize)
